mapper.select: select * from c_term
select count(*) from c_client_attr1 cca ,c_client_term cct,c_term ct where cct.c_term_id=#{termid} and ct.id=#{termid} and cct.c_client_id=cca.c_client_id and cca.coordinate like '%.%_,__.%'

select cct.c_client_id as id , cca.name as name, ct.name as termname, cct.c_term_id as termid , cca.coordinate as coordinate from c_client_attr1 cca ,c_client_term cct,c_term ct where cct.c_term_id=#{termid} and ct.id=#{termid} and cct.c_client_id=cca.c_client_id and cca.coordinate like '%.%_,__.%' GROUP BY cct.c_client_id ORDER BY cct.c_client_id ASC limit #{begin},#{rows}

select cga.c_gateway_id as client_attri_id,cg.id as id ,cga.name as name ,cga.coordinate as coordinate, cga.location as location ,cga.lamp_pole_num as lamppolenum ,cgt.NAME_CH as typename ,-999 as termid ,bs.`name` as status ,"网关/断路器组" as termname ,-999 as termid, cgt.NAME_CH as aliastypename from c_gateway cg ,c_gateway_attr1 cga ,c_gateway_type cgt ,b_status bs where cg.id=cga.c_gateway_id and cga.c_gateway_type_id=cgt.id and bs.b_status_main_id=3 and bs.`value`=cga.staus and cga.coordinate like '%.%_,__.%' ORDER BY cg.id ASC limit #{begin},#{rows}

select count(*) from c_gateway cg ,c_gateway_attr1 cga ,c_gateway_type cgt ,b_status bs where cg.id=cga.c_gateway_id and cga.c_gateway_type_id=cgt.id and bs.b_status_main_id=3 and bs.`value`=cga.staus and cga.coordinate like '%.%_,__.%'

select cca.id as client_attri_id,cc.id,cca.name,cca.lamp_pole_num as lamppolenum , cca.location, CASE WHEN partMap.c_client_id IS NOT NULL then partMap.external_coordinate ELSE cca.coordinate end coordinate , ct.name as termname, ccus.brightness , ccty.name as typename , ct.id as termid , ccty.id as typeid , bs.`name` as status, "灯" as aliastypename, CASE WHEN partMap.c_client_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as partMaplinetCnt FROM c_client cc INNER join c_client_attr1 cca ON cc.id = cca.c_client_id INNER JOIN c_client_term cct ON cc.id = cct.c_client_id INNER JOIN c_term ct ON cct.c_term_id = ct.id INNER JOIN c_client_upload_status ccus ON ccus.c_client_id = cca.id INNER JOIN b_status bs ON cca.staus=bs.`value` and bs.b_status_main_id=3 INNER JOIN c_client_type ccty ON ccty.id=cca.c_client_type_id LEFT JOIN (select cdl.c_client_id,external_coordinate from c_partmap cpp inner join c_partmap_detail cdl where cdl.id=cpp.id and cpp.c_termid=#{termid} and c_client_type_id='1' GROUP BY cdl.c_client_id) partMap ON partMap.c_client_id= cca.c_client_id WHERE ct.id=#{termid} and cca.coordinate like '%.%_,__.%' ORDER BY cct.c_client_id ASC limit #{begin},#{rows}

select ccty.id as typeid ,ccty.name as typename from c_client_term cct,c_client_attr1 cca , c_client_type ccty where cct.c_term_id=#{groupname} and cca.c_client_id=cct.c_client_id and cca.c_client_type_id=ccty.id and cca.coordinate like '%.%_,__.%' GROUP BY ccty.id
select cgt.id as typeid ,cgt.NAME_CH as typename from c_gateway_attr1 cga ,c_gateway_type cgt where cga.c_gateway_type_id =cgt.id and cga.coordinate like '%.%_,__.%' GROUP BY cgt.id

select cca.location, ccty.name as typename ,ccty.id as typeid from c_client_term cct,c_client_attr1 cca , c_client_type ccty where ccty.id=#{typeid} AND cct.c_term_id=#{termid} and cca.c_client_id=cct.c_client_id and cca.c_client_type_id=ccty.id and cca.coordinate like '%.%_,__.%' GROUP BY cca.location

select cgt.id as typeid ,cgt.NAME_CH as typename ,cga.location from c_gateway_attr1 cga ,c_gateway_type cgt where cga.c_gateway_type_id =#{typeid} and cga.coordinate like '%.%_,__.%' GROUP BY cga.location

select cca.name, cca.location,ccty.name as typename ,ccty.id as typeid from c_client_term cct,c_client_attr1 cca , c_client_type ccty where cca.location= #{location} and ccty.id=#{typeid} AND cct.c_term_id=#{termid} and cca.c_client_id=cct.c_client_id and cca.c_client_type_id=ccty.id and cca.coordinate like '%.%_,__.%' GROUP BY cca.name

select cgt.id as typeid ,cgt.NAME_CH as typename ,cga.location ,cga.name from c_gateway_attr1 cga ,c_gateway_type cgt where cga.c_gateway_type_id =#{typeid} and cga.location=#{location} and cga.coordinate like '%.%_,__.%' GROUP BY cga.name

select cca.c_client_id as id,cca.name, cca.location,ccty.name as typename ,ccty.id as typeid from c_client_term cct,c_client_attr1 cca , c_client_type ccty where cca.name= #{name} and cca.location= #{location} and ccty.id=#{typeid} AND cct.c_term_id=#{termid} and cca.c_client_id=cct.c_client_id and cca.c_client_type_id=ccty.id and cca.coordinate like '%.%_,__.%' GROUP BY cca.c_client_id

select cgt.id as typeid ,cgt.NAME_CH as typename ,cga.location ,cga.name ,cga.c_gateway_id as id from c_gateway_attr1 cga ,c_gateway_type cgt where cga.c_gateway_type_id =#{typeid} and cga.location=#{location} and cga.name=#{name} and cga.coordinate like '%.%_,__.%' GROUP BY cga.c_gateway_id

select cca.id as client_attri_id,cc.id,cca.name,cca.lamp_pole_num as lamppolenum , cca.location, CASE WHEN partMap.c_client_id IS NOT NULL then partMap.external_coordinate ELSE cca.coordinate end coordinate , ct.name as termname,ccus.brightness , ccty.name as typename ,bs.name as status , ct.id as termid ,"灯" as aliastypename , CASE WHEN partMap.c_client_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as partMaplinetCnt, partMap.id as partMap_Id from c_client cc INNER join c_client_attr1 cca ON cc.id = cca.c_client_id INNER JOIN c_client_term cct ON cc.id = cct.c_client_id INNER JOIN c_term ct ON cct.c_term_id = ct.id INNER JOIN c_client_upload_status ccus ON ccus.c_client_id = cca.id INNER JOIN b_status bs ON cca.staus=bs.`value` and bs.b_status_main_id=3 INNER JOIN c_client_type ccty ON ccty.id=cca.c_client_type_id LEFT JOIN (select cdl.c_client_id,external_coordinate,cpp.id from c_partmap cpp inner join c_partmap_detail cdl where cdl.id=cpp.id and cpp.c_termid=#{termid} and c_client_type_id='1' ) partMap ON partMap.c_client_id= cca.c_client_id where cca.coordinate like '%.%_,__.%'
and ( ccty.id=#{typeid})
and ( ct.id=#{termid})
and ( cca.location=#{location})
and ( cca.name=#{name})
and ( cc.id=#{id})
and ( cca.id=#{client_attri_id})
and Not exists(select cdl.c_client_id,external_coordinate,cpp.id from c_partmap cpp inner join c_partmap_detail cdl where cdl.id=cpp.id and cpp.c_termid=#{termid} and c_client_type_id='1' and cdl.id!=#{partMap_Id} and cdl.c_client_id=cca.c_client_id)
ORDER BY cct.c_client_id ASC

select cgt.id as typeid ,cgt.NAME_CH as typename ,cga.location ,cga.name ,cga.c_gateway_id as id ,cga.lamp_pole_num as lamppolenum ,cga.coordinate ,bs.name as status,cgt.NAME_CH as aliastypename ,-999 as termid from c_gateway_attr1 cga ,c_gateway_type cgt ,b_status bs where cga.c_gateway_type_id=cgt.id and bs.b_status_main_id=3 and bs.`value`=cga.staus and cga.coordinate like '%.%_,__.%'
and ( cga.c_gateway_type_id=#{typeid})
and ( cga.location=#{location})
and ( cga.name=#{name})
and (cga.c_gateway_id=#{id})
ORDER BY cga.c_gateway_id ASC
mapper.update: update c_client_upload_status cca set cca.brightness=100 where cca.c_client_id= #{id}
update c_client_upload_status cca set cca.brightness=0 where cca.c_client_id= #{id}
update c_client_upload_status ccus set ccus.brightness = #{brightness} where ccus.c_client_id = #{id}

update.if: update c_client_attr1 cca set cca.coordinate=#{coordinate} where cca.id=#{client_attri_id}
update c_gateway_attr1 cga set cga.coordinate=#{coordinate} where cga.c_gateway_id=#{client_attri_id}
update c_breaker_attr1 cba set cba.coordinate=#{coordinate} where cba.id=#{client_attri_id}

delete from c_partmap_detail where id=#{id}
and (c_client_id=#{c_client_id})
mapper.select:
select a.id,partmap_name ,a.external_coordinate ,a.map_pictrue_path,a.c_client_type_id ,a.c_termid,b.inner_coordinate, b.c_client_id from c_partmap A LEFT JOIN c_partmap_detail B on a.id=b.id where 1=1
and (a.partmap_name=#{partmap_name})
and (a.map_pictrue_path=#{map_pictrue_path})
and (a.external_coordinate=#{external_coordinate})
and (a.id=#{id})
and (a.c_termid=#{c_termid})
ORDER BY a.id,external_coordinate

select A.ID,A.partmap_name ,A.external_coordinate ,count(B.c_client_id) as clinetCnt ,A.map_pictrue_path,A.c_termid from c_partmap A LEFT JOIN c_partmap_detail B on A.ID=B.ID where 1=1 Group BY A.partmap_name ,A.external_coordinate,A.map_pictrue_path,A.c_termid
